name: Chair Simulator 2016
description:
You are a possessed chair running around killing and destroying everything around you. The objective is to get as much points as you possibly can. The gameplay is unlimited!

The game is in development and may have more maps, NPC's and models.

Enjoy a game with awesome 8-Bit music, funny unrealistic physics, funny sounds and a farting chair!!!

If you are having some problems, please E-mail us at

redfallstudiosgames@gmail.com
